mapper.insert: insert into review (review_comment, review_score, order_code, product_code, customer_code) values (#{review_comment}, #{review_score}, #{order_code}, #{product_code}, #{customer_code})
mapper.update: update review set review_comment = #{review_comment} where review_code = #{review_code}
mapper.select: select review_code, review_date, review_comment, review_score, product_code, customer_code from review where product_code = #{product_code} order by review_date
